text: The Old Folks at Home is a 1916 American drama silent black and white film directed by Chester Withey. It is based on the story by Rupert Hughes. ==Cast== * Sir Herbert Beerbohm Tree as John Coburn * Josephine Crowell as Mrs. Coburn * Elmer Clifton as Steve Coburn * Mildred Harris as Marjorie * Lucille Young as Lucia Medina * W.E. Lawrence as Stanley * Spottiswoode Aitken as Judge * Alfred Paget * Wilbur Higby * Charles Lee ==References== ==External links== * Category:American drama films Category:1916 drama films Category:1916 films Category:Triangle Film Corporation films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Films directed by Chester Withey Category:Films based on works by Rupert Hughes Category:American films
title: The Old Folks at Home (film)
